group_1.textLeft: How about this one?@Where did you take this photo?

group_1.textRight: There're more cats than humans there.

group_1.textLeft: (His name is [textRed:Mr. R].@That's not his real name, of course.)
(The R stands for restaurant, since@that's kinda where I meet him.)
(He's looking for his final resting place.@Somewhere he can spend the rest of his life)
(He's been all over Japan. Abroad, even.)

group_1.narration: I think he's just like me...
Searching for somewhere@that feels just right, where@he can stand steady.
We hadn't exactly discussed it,@but in my own mind, that's the @impression, the strong feeling I @got from him. Yet…
I want to know more about him.
The fact that I felt so strongly about him@was enough for me to want to know more.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder...where he is right now...
What kind of stories will he@tell me next time we meet?
Mr. R...!@It's nice to see you again.[chara:300701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]
...Let's go to the table in the back.

group_1.textRight: I had a good time.@It was a great place.
But...I wouldn’t want to stay@there for the rest of my life.
Are you going to take over this@place someday, Shizuku?

group_1.textLeft: I guess I could if I really needed to but...

group_1.textRight: Is that so?@Well then, let's look for a place together.
A place where we can spend @a lifetime without regret.
